title: How to Cook Salted Fish with Young Mango

steps.headline: Wash and cut salted fish to manageable rectangles or squares
Wash mangoes and peel off skin.
steps.description: Cut approximately into the same size as the salted fish.

steps.headline: Wash and roughly chop the side ingredients and set aside.
Heat a wok and add oil.
When the oil is hot, fry the the salted fish until it is crisp but not burnt.
Take out the oil from the fish fry and wash the wok.
Heat the wok again and fry the side ingredients for 2 minutes.
Add the chopped mangoes and fry for a further 3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the fried salted fish to the wok and mix thoroughly.
If the mixture is too dry, 2 tablespoons of water can be added.

text: Wash and cut salted fish to manageable rectangles or squares  Wash mangoes and peel off skin. Cut approximately into the same size as the salted fish. Wash and roughly chop the side ingredients and set aside.  Heat a wok and add oil.  When the oil is hot, fry the the salted fish until it is crisp but not burnt. Put it aside. Take out the oil from the fish fry and wash the wok.  Heat the wok again and fry the side ingredients for 2 minutes.  Add the chopped mangoes and fry for a further 3 minutes, stirring occasionally.  Add the fried salted fish to the wok and mix thoroughly.  Add sugar according to taste.  If the mixture is too dry, 2 tablespoons of water can be added.  Serve immediately while hot.
